title: Chris Kluwe: The Courage and Cost of Civil Disobedience
description: Join us for a conversation with former NFL player and author Chris Kluwe, discussing civil disobedience and standing up for beliefs.
raw_text:
Wilkinson College
the heart and soul of Chapman

JOIN US FOR A COMPELLING CONVERSATION WITH

CHRIS KLUWE:
THE COURAGE AND COST OF CIVIL DISOBEDIENCE

FORMER NFL PLAYER AND AUTHOR CHRIS KLUWE WILL DISCUSS THE POWER AND CONSEQUENCES OF CIVIL DISOBEDIENCE

Kluwe was recently handcuffed, arrested and forcibly removed from a Huntington Beach City Council meeting while opposing the use of public funds to promote MAGA ideology at the local library. In this question-and-answer session, Kluwe will share his experiences with civil disobedience, the personal and professional risks of standing up for one's beliefs, and what it truly means to fight for democracy in today's America. Don't miss this timely discussion on courage and the price of dissent.

THURSDAY APRIL 24 4PM TO 5PM ARGYROS FORUM 208

CHAPMAN UNIVERSITY
Wilkinson College of Arts, Humanities, and Social Sciences
